content:
Craft an item of type: redstone_block
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 64, "index": 17}, {"type": "iron_ore", "quantity": 21, "index": 21}, {"type": "golden_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 32}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 9, "index": 34}]
thought: To craft a redstone block I need to place 9 redstone in a 3x3 grid. I will start by moving one redstone to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: redstone_block
inventory=[{"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 64, "index": 17}, {"type": "iron_ore", "quantity": 21, "index": 21}, {"type": "golden_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 8, "index": 32}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 9, "index": 34}]
thought: I have already placed one redstone in the top left corner of the crafting grid, so I will move another redstone to the right of it.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 2 with quantity 1
